Package scenegraph

Class SkyBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • scenegraph.AbstSceneObject
      • scenegraph.AbstNode
        • scenegraph.AbstSpatial
          • scenegraph.SkyBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ChannelInterface
    public class SkyBox
extends AbstSpatial
    Class for basic geometric shapes: Cube, Sphere, Torus, Teapot, Cone and Tetrahedron. Instead of the vertices, this class only stores some characteristic attributes for the shapes (like the radius for a sphere etc.)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ursula Derichs

    • Field Summary
